hotels.title: Boutique New Zealand Luxury Lodge in the Southern Alps with Farm-to-Table Dining & Wilderness Experiences
hotels.description: Tucked away in the heart of New Zealand's Southern Alps, this stay is a haven of tranquillity and adventure. This mountain retreat offers easy access to the world-renowned Arthur's Pass National Park, where hiking trails and breathtaking vistas abound. After a day of exploration, retreat to the lodge's cosy restaurant, Sugarloaf, where you can savour locally sourced dishes paired with fine New Zealand wines. For those seeking relaxation, the lodge's tranquil gardens provide the perfect setting to sit back with a good book and a warm drink.
